scriptmodule.description:
Validates the content of a search results container displayed on top or below the search results.
@Parameters: Location: element to be validated named by css selector LocationNumber: number of the search container (1 for header, 2 for footer) SortMethod: checks the dropdown list (e.g. Top Sellers) ItemsPerPage: checks the dropdown list (e.g. 12) ShownProducts: checks the text (e.g. 1-12) MaxItems: checks the maximum number of search results CurrentPage: number of the page currently displayed NumberOfPages: checks the number of pages
